alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 6:12PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central New Hanover and east central Brunswick Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 611 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Silver Lake, or near Wilmington, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Leland, Carolina Beach, Wrightsville Beach, South Masonboro Island, Snows Cut, North Masonboro Island, Boiling Spring Lakes, Myrtle Grove, Silver Lake, Sea Breeze, Masonboro, Seagate, University Of North Carolina At Wilmington, Belville, New Hanover Regional Medical Center and Cape Fear Hospital. This includes US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 41 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover
